channel.title: code of conduct on hexdevs

item.title: Our Code of Conduct
item.description: This is the hexdevs Code of Conduct In order to make sure this community can be home to everyone, we’ve put together a few guidelines. We expect members… Be kind to each other, and to yourself. Create opportunities to collaborate with one another, and invite others to do so. Take care of our space as if it’s your home (or better). Leave spaces better than you found them. Encourage others in their endeavors, and respect each other’s privacy.
